device.name: ADuCM363
device.licenseText:
THIS SOFTWARE IS PROVIDED BY ANALOG DEVICES INC. ``AS IS'' AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, OR NON-INFRINGEMENT, ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL ANALOG DEVICES INC. BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
YOU ASSUME ANY AND ALL RISK FROM THE USE OF THIS CODE OR SUPPORT FILE.
IT IS THE RESPONSIBILITY OF THE PERSON INTEGRATING THIS CODE INTO AN APPLICATION TO ENSURE THAT THE RESULTING APPLICATION PERFORMS AS REQUIRED AND IS SAFE.

field.name: EVENTEN
field.description: Enable time capture of an event

field.name: EVENT
field.description: Event Select, selects 1 of the available events.

field.name: RLD
field.description: Timer reload on write to clear register

enumeratedValue.name: DIV32768
enumeratedValue.description: - If the selected clock source is UCLK then this setting results in a prescaler of 4.

field.name: CLRI
field.description: Value updated in the timer clock domain

field.name: EVENTEN
field.description: Enable time capture of an event

field.name: EVENT
field.description: Event Select, selects 1 of the available events.

field.name: RLD
field.description: Timer reload on write to clear register

enumeratedValue.name: DIV32768
enumeratedValue.description: - If the selected clock source is UCLK then this setting results in a prescaler of 4.

field.name: CLRI
field.description: Value updated in the timer clock domain

field.name: CONVSTART
field.description: Enable adc conversion start from pwm

register.name: PWMCLRI
register.description: PWM interrupt clear. Write to this register clears the latched PWM interrupt.

register.name: PWM0COM0
register.description: Compare Register 0 for PWM0 and PWM1

register.name: PWM0COM1
register.description: Compare Register 1 for PWM0 and PWM1

register.name: PWM0COM2
register.description: Compare Register 2 for PWM0 and PWM1

register.name: PWM0LEN
register.description: Period Value register for PWM0 and PWM1

register.name: PWM1COM0
register.description: Compare Register 0 for PWM2 and PWM3

register.name: PWM1COM1
register.description: Compare Register 1 for PWM2 and PWM3

register.name: PWM1COM2
register.description: Compare Register 2 for PWM2 and PWM3

register.name: PWM1LEN
register.description: Period Value register for PWM2 and PWM3

register.name: PWM2COM0
register.description: Compare Register 0 for PWM4 and PWM5

register.name: PWM2COM1
register.description: Compare Register 1 for PWM4 and PWM5

register.name: PWM2COM2
register.description: Compare Register 2 for PWM4 and PWM5

register.name: PWM2LEN
register.description: Period Value register for PWM4 and PWM5

register.name: PWRKEY
register.description: Key protection for the PWRMOD register.

field.name: STOPINC
field.description: Stop wake up field A being updated

field.name: CLKOUT
field.description: GPIO output clock multiplexer select bits

field.name: CLKMUX
field.description: Digital subsystem clock source select bits.

field.name: PWMCD
field.description: Clock divide bits for PWM system clock

field.name: UART0CD
field.description: Clock divide bits for UART0 system clock

field.name: I2CCD
field.description: Clock divide bits for I2C system clock

field.name: SPI1CD
field.description: Clock divide bits for SPI1 system clock

field.name: SPI0CD
field.description: Clock divide bits for SPI0 system clock

field.name: DACCD
field.description: Clock divide bits for DAC system clock

field.name: UART2CD
field.description: Clock divide bits for UART2 system clock

field.name: UART1CD
field.description: Clock divide bits for UART1 system clock

field.name: ENABLE
field.description: Crystal oscillator circuit enable (Enable the oscillator circuitry.)

field.name: CLKSEL
field.description: Clock divide bits for root system clock

field.name: SIGNERR
field.description: Info space signature check on reset error

register.name: FEEAEN0
register.description: Lower 16 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

register.name: FEEAEN1
register.description: Upper 16 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

register.name: FEEAEN2
register.description: Upper 32..47 bits of the sys irq abort enable register.

field.name: MSTOP
field.description: STOP driven by th eI2C master

field.name: NACKDATA
field.description: Ack not received in response to data write

field.name: NACKADDR
field.description: Ack not received in response to an address

register.name: I2CSSTA
register.description: Slave I2C Status, Error and IRQ Register

field.name: STOP
field.description: Stop after start and matching address

field.name: NOACK
field.description: Ack not generated by the slave

field.name: TXFSEREQ
field.description: Tx FIFO status or early request

register.name: I2CFSTA
register.description: Master and Slave Rx/Tx FIFO Status Register

field.name: RXS
field.description: Set when there are more bytes in the RX FIFO than the TIM bit says

field.name: RX
field.description: Set when a receive interrupt occurs

field.name: TX
field.description: Set when a transmit interrupt occurs

field.name: DIV
field.description: Factor used to divide UCLK to generate the serial clock

enumeratedValue.name: RXRD
enumeratedValue.description: - Cleared by user to initiate transfer with a read of the SPIRX register

enumeratedValue.name: TXWR
enumeratedValue.description: - Set by user to initiate transfer with a write to the SPITX register.

field.name: RXS
field.description: Set when there are more bytes in the RX FIFO than the TIM bit says

field.name: RX
field.description: Set when a receive interrupt occurs

field.name: TX
field.description: Set when a transmit interrupt occurs

field.name: DIV
field.description: Factor used to divide UCLK to generate the serial clock

enumeratedValue.name: RXRD
enumeratedValue.description: - Cleared by user to initiate transfer with a read of the SPIRX register

enumeratedValue.name: TXWR
enumeratedValue.description: - Set by user to initiate transfer with a write to the SPITX register.

field.name: EDMAR
field.description: Enable DMA requests in transmit mode

field.name: EDMAT
field.description: Enable DMA requests in receive mode

enumeratedValue.name: RXBUFFULL
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive buffer full interrupt. Read RBR register to clear.

enumeratedValue.name: RXLINESTATUS
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive line status interrupt. Read LSR register to clear.

field.name: TEMT
field.description: COMTX and Shift Register Empty Status Bit.

field.name: EDMAR
field.description: Enable DMA requests in transmit mode

field.name: EDMAT
field.description: Enable DMA requests in receive mode

enumeratedValue.description: - Receive buffer full interrupt. Read RBR register to clear.

enumeratedValue.name: RXLINESTATUS
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive line status interrupt. Read LSR register to clear.

enumeratedValue.name: RXLINESTATUS
enumeratedValue.description: - Receive line status interrupt. Read LSR register to clear.

field.name: TEMT
field.description: COMTX and Shift Register Empty Status Bit.

register.name: IEXCCON
register.description: Controls the on-chip Excitation Current Sources

register.name: IEXCDAT
register.description: Sets the output current setting for both Excitation Current sources

register.name: DMASTA
register.description: Returns the status of the controller when not in the reset state.

field.name: CHNLSMINUS1
field.description: Number of available DMA channels minus one.

enumeratedValue.name: FOURTEENCHNLS
enumeratedValue.description: - Controller configured to use 14 DMA channels

enumeratedValue.name: TWELVECHNLS
enumeratedValue.description: - Controller configured to use 12 DMA channels

field.name: STATE
field.description: Current state of the control state machine.

enumeratedValue.name: WAITDMAREQCLR
enumeratedValue.description: - Waiting for DMA request to clear

field.name: CTRLBASEPTR
field.description: Pointer to the base address of the primary data structure

field.name: ALTCBPTR
field.description: Pointer to the base address of the alternate data structure

field.name: BLOCKCOUNT
field.description: The number of 4KB address blocks you require, to access the registers, expressed in powers of 2.

field.name: JEP106CCODE
field.description: The JEP106 continuation code value represents how many 0x7F continuation characters occur in the manufacturer?s identity code.

field.name: REVISION
field.description: The revision status of the controller.

field.name: JEDECUSED
field.description: This indicates that the controller uses a manufacturer?s identity code that was allocated by JEDEC according to JEP106.

field.name: MODNUM
field.description: The customer must update this field if they modify the RTL of the controller.

register.name: ICTR
register.description: Shows the number of interrupt lines that the NVIC supports

field.name: INTLINESNUM
field.description: Total number of interrupt lines in groups of 32

field.name: COUNTFLAG
field.description: Returns 1 if timer counted to 0 since last time this register was read

field.name: TICKINT
field.description: If 1, counting down to 0 will cause the SysTick exception to pended.

field.name: RELOAD
field.description: Value to load into the Current Value register when the counter reaches 0

field.name: NOREF
field.description: If reads as 1, the Reference clock is not provided

field.name: SKEW
field.description: If reads as 1, the calibration value for 10ms is inexact

field.name: TENMS
field.description: An optional Reload value to be used for 10ms (100Hz) timing

field.name: NMIPENDSET
field.description: Setting this bit will activate an NMI

field.name: PENDSTSET
field.description: Set a pending SysTick. Reads back with current state

field.name: ISRPREEMPT
field.description: If set, a pending exception will be serviced on exit from the debug halt state

field.name: ISRPENDING
field.description: Indicates if an external configurable is pending

field.name: VECTPENDING
field.description: Indicates the exception number for the highest priority pending exception

register.name: AIRCR
register.description: Application Interrupt and Reset Control Register

field.name: ENDIANESS
field.description: This bit is static or configured by a hardware input on reset

field.name: VECTCLRACTIVE
field.description: Clears all active state information for fixed and configurable exceptions

field.name: SLEEPONEXIT
field.description: Sleep on exit when returning from handler mode to thread mode

field.name: SVCALLPENDED
field.description: Reads as 1 if SVCall is Pending

field.name: BUSFAULTPENDED
field.description: Reads as 1 if BusFault is Pending

field.name: MEMFAULTPENDED
field.description: Reads as 1 if MemManage is Pending

field.name: USGFAULTPENDED
field.description: Reads as 1 if UsageFault is Pending

field.name: SYSTICKACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if SysTick is Active

field.name: PENDSVACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if PendSV is Active

field.name: MONITORACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if the Monitor is Active

field.name: SVCALLACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if SVCall is Active

field.name: USGFAULTACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if UsageFault is Active.

field.name: BUSFAULTACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if BusFault is Active.

field.name: MEMFAULTACT
field.description: Reads as 1 if MemManage is Active

field.name: INVSTATE
field.description: Invalid EPSR.T bit or illegal EPSR.IT bits for executing

field.name: BFARVALID
field.description: This bit is set if the BFAR register has valid contents

field.name: STKERR
field.description: This bit indicates a derived bus fault has occurred on exception entry

field.name: UNSTKERR
field.description: This bit indicates a derived bus fault has occurred on exception return

field.name: PRECISERR
field.description: Precise data access error. The BFAR is written with the faulting address

field.name: IBUSERR
field.description: This bit indicates a bus fault on an instruction prefetch

field.name: MMARVALID
field.description: This bit is set if the MMAR register has valid contents.

field.name: MSTKERR
field.description: A derived MemManage fault has occurred on exception entry

field.name: MUNSTKERR
field.description: A derived MemManage fault has occurred on exception return

field.name: DACCVIOL
field.description: Data access violation. The MMAR is set to the data address which the load store tried to access.

field.name: DEBUGEVT
field.description: Debug event, and the Debug Fault Status Register has been updated.

field.name: FORCED
field.description: Configurable fault cannot be activated due to priority or it was disabled. Priority escalated to a HardFault.

field.name: VECTTBL
field.description: Fault was due to vector table read on exception processing

field.name: ADDRESS
field.description: Updated on precise data access faults

field.name: INTID
field.description: The value written in this field is the interrupt to be triggered.

field.name: ATHEX
field.description: ADC Accumulator Comparator Threshold status bit.

field.name: ATHEX
field.description: ADC Accumulator Comparator Threshold status bit mask

enumeratedValue.name: DIS
enumeratedValue.description: Disable powerdown - Negative buffer is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: EN
enumeratedValue.description: Enable powerdown - Negative buffer is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: DIS
enumeratedValue.description: Disable powerdown - Positive buffer is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: EN
enumeratedValue.description: Enable powerdown - Positive buffer is disabled

register.name: ADC0INTGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using internal reference

register.name: ADC0EXTGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using external reference

register.name: ADC0VDDGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using AVDD as the ADC reference

register.name: ADCCFG
register.description: Control register for the VBIAS voltage generator, ground switch and external reference buffer

field.name: BOOST30
field.description: Boost the Vbias current source ability by 30 times

field.name: PINSEL
field.description: Enable vbias generator, send vbias to selected ain pin bits

field.name: EXTBUF
field.description: Control signals for ext_ref buffers bits

field.name: SINC4EN
field.description: Enable the Sinc4 filter instead of Sinc3 filter.

field.name: ADCMOD2
field.description: ADC modulator gain of 2 control bits

register.name: ADC0RCR
register.description: Number of ADC0 conversions before an ADC interrupt is generated.

register.name: ADC0RCV
register.description: This 16-bit, read-only MMR holds the current number of ADC0 conversion results

register.name: ADC0THC
register.description: Determines how many cumulative ADC0 conversion result readings above ADC0TH must occur

register.name: ADC0ATH
register.description: Holds the threshold value for the accumulator comparator

register.name: ADC0PRO
register.description: Configuration register for Post processing of ADC0 results

field.name: ATHEX
field.description: ADC Accumulator Comparator Threshold status bit.

field.name: ATHEX
field.description: ADC Accumulator Comparator Threshold status bit mask

enumeratedValue.name: DIS
enumeratedValue.description: Disable powerdown - Negative buffer is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: EN
enumeratedValue.description: Enable powerdown - Negative buffer is disabled

enumeratedValue.name: DIS
enumeratedValue.description: Disable powerdown - Positive buffer is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: EN
enumeratedValue.description: Enable powerdown - Positive buffer is disabled

register.name: ADC1INTGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using internal reference

register.name: ADC1EXTGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using external reference

register.name: ADC1VDDGN
register.description: Gain calibration register when using AVDD as the ADC reference

register.name: ADCSCFG1
register.description: Control register for the VBIAS voltage generator, ground switch and external reference buffer

field.name: BOOST30
field.description: Boost the Vbias current source ability by 30 times

field.name: PINSEL
field.description: Enable vbias generator, send vbias to selected ain pin bits

field.name: EXTBUF
field.description: Control signals for ext_ref buffers bits

field.name: SINC4EN
field.description: Enable the Sinc4 filter instead of Sinc3 filter.

field.name: ADCMOD2
field.description: ADC modulator gain of 2 control bits

register.name: ADC1RCR
register.description: Number of ADC1 conversions before an ADC interrupt is generated.

register.name: ADC1RCV
register.description: This 16-bit, read-only MMR holds the current number of ADC1 conversion results

register.name: ADC1THC
register.description: Determines how many cumulative ADC1 conversion result readings above ADC1TH must occur

register.name: ADC1ATH
register.description: Holds the threshold value for the accumulator comparator

register.name: ADC1PRO
register.description: Configuration register for Post processing of ADC1 results

register.name: DETCON
register.description: Control register for reference detection and the step detection filter

field.name: STEPCTRL
field.description: Control the method to generate the step flag

field.name: RATE
field.description: Control the sinc2 filter's time interval

register.name: STEPDAT
register.description: Offers coarse data from the output of the step detection filter
